item.description:
Have you ever had telepathic dreams? Have you ever read the thoughts of other people in your dreams? Has anyone ever read your thoughts in their dreams? Have you ever dreamed the same dream as someone else? The dreaming mind is very sensitive and open to thought forms from other beings, especially people one is close to. In this month's dream Meetup we will explore mind-reading in dreams. Deerheart has telepathic dream experiences to share. Learn techniques for dream telepathy. Bring any dreams you want to share, whether or not they are telepathic dreams, in our safe and supportive community of dreamers.

Deerheart is a spiritual guide, visionary artist, and tantric shaman. People are drawn to him to share their life stories, life challenges, and dreams. He provides gentle guidance, understanding, and intuitive healing love energy. His heart of compassion looks upon all with unconditional love. An experienced explorer of the dream realms for for over 25 years, he has researched and studied many books and studied under many teachers. For more information about him, visit his website, Visionary Dream Guide.

Payment is $10 and can be made online or in person. Anyone who cannot afford to pay is encouraged to attend anyway and should contact the group organizer Deerheart before attending.

Event will be from 7 pm until 9 pm. Space is limited to 15 people. RSVP requested. Please update your RSVP if you are unable to attend, to allow others to attend. Thank you.

For directions and other information about location please visit the Cambridge Swedenborg Chapel website.
item.how_to_find_us: Side entrance by the parking lot, up stairs, through hallway, left through angel doorway, into parlor.
item.name: Dream Telepathy
